name: Pull The Pin - Push Balls
description:
Just pull and dig with your fingers — and guide the ball to the cup. It's easy, yet challenging. There is often a trick to solve the levels, sometimes you need take advantage of the objects' speed, sometimes you need to make objects collide, but often it is enough to use your intuitive thinking.
Features:
• Inventive and unique gameplay.
• Easy to understand.
• Realistic Physics.
• Encourages logical thinking and creativity.
• Discover new features like bombs and multi-colored balls.
• 3D-graphics.
